data.text: @Gerry673 No, but Amazon is pushing it hard right now.  Maybe after Christmas.

@melbotis Having said that, are you watching Mrs. Maisle? I think you'd dig it and it may be for reasons people aren't talking about. I don't know because I'm not reading anything about it. But it's doing this kind of stylized classic 50s comedy thing but somehow still being fresh.
@MaxKennerly as long as that money is going to keeping David Schwimmer off the streets.

@Gerry673 I've also seen it a lot from critics and reviewers as a tweet to get clicks as people fear they're missing out on something.  At this point, that's a turn off from me both clicking and trying the show.
@melbotis That's really about wanting to have things to talk about with people which, really, I can do without. So I'm with you. I watch what I watch and I don't what I don't.
